function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of social harms leading to health inequalities within the built environment","Impact":"Exacerbation of health inequalities and propagation of social harms within the built environment","Mitigation":"Addressing social determinants of health, promoting equitable housing policies, and investing in housing infrastructure","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, data analytics for identifying disparities, infrastructure improvements for housing","People":"Residents within the built environment, particularly those in vulnerable housing situations","Owner":"Government agencies, housing organizations, public health institutions"},{"Description":"Amplification of pre-existing health inequalities within the home environment","Impact":"Worsening of health disparities and exacerbation of existing health inequalities within homes","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare services, providing education on health behaviors, and addressing housing-related factors contributing to health disparities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health platforms, remote monitoring devices for at-home health management","People":"Residents of homes, especially those with limited access to healthcare and resources","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Psycho-social impact of home instability and housing uncertainties on health and well-being","Impact":"Negative effects on mental health, well-being, and social cohesion due to housing uncertainties","Mitigation":"Promoting housing stability, providing mental health support, and building social support networks within communities","Technologies":"Teletherapy, virtual support groups, mental health apps, community engagement platforms","People":"Individuals and families affected by housing instability and uncertainties","Owner":"Mental health professionals, community organizations, housing support services"}]}
